TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void KeyboardEventHandler(object sender, KeyboardEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed KeyboardEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub KeyboardEventHandler(sender As Object, e As KeyboardEventArgs)

type KeyboardEventHandler = delegate of obj * KeyboardEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: Objeto en que está asociado el controlador de eventos.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará los eventos enrutados relacionados con el teclado.

span.span: Represents the method that will handle keyboard-related routed events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ningún evento de teclado existente en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] usa el delegar.No existing keyboard event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the delegate. usa el clase como su clase de evento base. uses the base class as its event data class. actúa como clase base para la dirección URL más y las clases de datos de eventos. serves as the base class for the more specific and event data classes. Estas clases de datos de eventos se usan por el y delegados y los delegados se usan al existir [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] eventos, como y .These event data classes are used by the and delegates, and those delegates are used by existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] events such as and .
